text:
@SpeakerPelosi @WHO Stop spreading #FakeNews @WHO was a #China puppet and a disaster in handling the #COVID19 virus! 

You’re a disgrace to all Americans for using the pandemic as a political tool to try to win an election. https://t.co/oow4oUzFQt
